name: import-clipboard-schematic
title: How to Import a Schematic from Copy Paste Clipboard.

steps.name: Open Schematics Menu
steps.text: Go into any game, singleplayer or multiplayer. For desktop the button is in the bottom right. For mobile it is in the top left. The button looks like a clipboard.

steps.name: Click the import schematic button.
steps.text: At the bottom of the menu, find a "Import Schematics" button and click it.

steps.name: Click the "Import from Clipboard"
steps.text: Click the import from clipboard button, it should be the top option. Be sure that the last thing you copied was the schematic text.
